alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 11 at 5:05PM PDT until October 12 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire and Orange County Inland Areas. Highest below the Cajon and Banning Passes, as well as Santa Ana mountain foothills. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty Santa Ana winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
